TopicTitle: USI Kontainer Bug 1.0.4 - Is it possible to fix the save file to fix this craft?

Articles.Content:
I'm having this strange bug with the largest (3.75m) kontainer from USI:

Is it possible to fix this by editing the save? Here's the vessel in question, along with the part. [http://pastebin.com/Rp09FLRg](http://pastebin.com/Rp09FLRg)

![hR4hqJ5.png](http://i.imgur.com/hR4hqJ5.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-26T14:41:16Z" title="07/26/2015 02:41  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 26, 2015</time> by MarcAlain**
Possibly but you've not given much info on the issue. Probably get a better answer in the USI thread anyway ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Possibly but you've not given much info on the issue. Probably get a better answer in the USI thread anyway ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Here's the code for the craft, with the part in question as well

[http://pastebin.com/Rp09FLRg](http://pastebin.com/Rp09FLRg)

I've not yet received an answer in the USI thead, either.
Perhaps you will get more help if you could describe what the bug is rather than expecting us to guess based on a screenshot and a partial chunk of save/craft file...

> 
> Perhaps you will get more help if you could describe what the bug is rather than expecting us to guess based on a screenshot and a partial chunk of save/craft file...

How is it not obvious? It's the wrong size, like I don't mean to be rude, but it's pretty obvious.

You could try putting a second identical craft on the Launchpad and then finding the relevant part in that and copy it over the part in the bad vessel. However, I suspect the problem is likely to return. There used to be a problem very similar to this just after one of the KSP updates changed how the size of parts was specified but I wouldn't expect any mod to still have that problem. Is that part the root part of the vessel by any chance?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-26T15:35:15Z" title="07/26/2015 03:35  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 26, 2015</time> by Padishar**
